mission_data.mission_description: These Are The Voyages... Ep. V^^The Excalibur's predecessor, A TSN Light Cruiser with the same name, passes through a rift in time, undoing ceasefire negotiations between the USFP and Torgoth...^^*Recommended for experienced crews*

event.name: Mission Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: Thanks to your efforts we are on the verge of a major diplomatic breakthrough in this war. The Torgoth have decided that the USFP and TSN are not their enemies at this time. We are sure that you are familiar enough with TSN history to remember the eight Light Cruisers that made up our first spacefaring fleet. The Artemis, Intrepid, Aegis, Horatio, Hera, Ceres, Diana, and of course, the Excalibur. Many of these ships are still in service; however, many years ago the original Excalibur sacrificed itself defending a Torgoth station in the Narendra system just past the border of the Neutral Zone from some sort of attack. In honor of that sacrifice, the Torgoth have agreed to begin peace talks at that very same station. You are to escort a USFP emissary there, and oversee the negotiations. As a show of good faith, the Torgoth will not be sending any of their warships to the station.

event.name: Envoy Ripley

set_comms_button.text: What was it that attacked this station and destroyed the first Excalibur?

event.incoming_comms_text: Thank you for bringing me this far, Excalibur. It is fitting that the second TSN vessel to be named Excalibur, your Battleship, would also play a major part in the USFP's history with the Torgoth. We are almost at the Narendra III Torgoth outpost. Once we are within transporter range, I will beam aboard it and the negotiations will begin. You won't need to dock. Just relax, and play it cool. We don't want anything to come across like we are interested in anything other than a ceasefire on the Torgoth front.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Transporter Room to Bridge on COMMS.

event.name: History Lesson

if_comms_button.text: What was it that attacked this station and destroyed the first Excalibur?

set_comms_button.text: Do you think the Torgoth would have done the same for them at the time?

clear_comms_button.text: What was it that attacked this station and destroyed the first Excalibur?

event.incoming_comms_text: While there are some key pieces of information missing, records state that when the TSN lost contact with Excalibur it sent several ships to the Neutral Zone demanding to know if the Torgoth had anything to do with it's disappearance. The Torgoth simply stated that the Excalibur defended this outpost from some kind of ambush, and that they were eternally grateful for their sacrifice. TSN Intelligence has speculated that the Torgoth may have started to catch on to the manipulation of the Skaraan and Arvonians around that time. It is hypothesized that a cloaked Skaraan Executor class could have taken the station by surpise and also have been more than a match for a TSN Light Cruiser.

event.name: Speculation

if_comms_button.text: Do you think the Torgoth would have done the same for them at the time?

event.incoming_comms_text: Who knows? While my gut tells me no, I remind myself how grateful we all are that today the Torgoth are open to these discussions thanks to the efforts of that crew, as well as yours.

clear_comms_button.text: Do you think the Torgoth would have done the same for them at the time?

event.name: Closing In
event.incoming_comms_text: We are almost within transporter range. Take it nice steady, and I will beam aboard to begin discussions. There are plenty of anomalies in this region of space if the Excalibur needs an energy recharge.

clear_comms_button.text: What was it that attacked this station and destroyed the first Excalibur?
Do you think the Torgoth would have done the same for them at the time?

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Transporter room to bridge on COMMS.

event.name: Transporting Envoy
event.incoming_comms_text: This is transporter room to bridge. Envoy Ripley has just beamed aboard Narendra III.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Strange reading in sector C2.

set_ship_text.desc: COMPUTER: Sensors indicate the phenomenon is similar to the one you encountered at Tyken Station. Scan again with ENTER key.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: COMPUTER: It appears to be a disturbance in the space time continuum. Recommend Excalibur gets closer for further sensor analysis, but be careful to not get too close. Slow approach is recommended.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Warning! Subspace tear opening! A vessel is emerging from the black hole.

event.name: The Excalibur I appears
event.incoming_comms_text: I no longer have Envoy Ripley's signal in the transporter! It's gone!

event.name: Science Scan Again
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Captain Garrett of the starship Excalibur to... The Excalibur? What's going on here!? We have been attacked by Skaraan warships and require immediate assistance! We've sustained damage to our shields and warp drive systems.

set_ship_text.desc: COMPUTER: The Torgoth station has vanished. System terrain has changed. An enemy ship has appeared from thin air on an intercept course. The original Excalibur, destroyed 22 years ago defending the station, is somehow now in the present. Hit ENTER to analyze further.
set_ship_text.scan_desc: COMPUTER: That Excalibur must have time traveled via the black hole, meaning the station was never saved from the attack. With history having changed, we must still be at war with the Torgoth. Our proximity to the black hole must have protected us from the changed timeline. Until the correct course of action can be determined, the other Excalibur must be protected.

set_comms_button.text: Captain Garret, yes, we are ready to assist.

event.name: Comms 1

if_comms_button.text: Captain Garret, yes, we are ready to assist.

event.incoming_comms_text: That's strange... our sensors aren't picking up any Skaraan ships anymore, or the Torgoth Base. Perhaps the Skaraan have cloaked again, or maybe our sensors are damaged as well. We are, however, picking up some Torgoth ships in the area. Could it be they sent reinforcements to the region? We were under the impression that help was too far away to reach here in time, and that the Skaraan were attempting to make it look as though we were responsibe for the attack. Our hypothesis was that the Skaraan were trying to manipulate the Torgoth somehow, but everything doesn't seem right all of a sudden... I've never seen a TSN ship like yours before, let alone two ships sharing te same name. What's going on?

set_comms_button.text: We believe you have traveled 22 years into the future.

clear_comms_button.text: Captain Garret, yes, we are ready to assist.

event.name: Comms 2

if_comms_button.text: We believe you have traveled 22 years into the future.

clear_comms_button.text: We believe you have traveled 22 years into the future.

set_comms_button.text: We believe you traveled through that singularity. Our records indicate that you died fighting the Skaraan. We are not from this time either. In our timeline we are currently negotiating a ceasefire with the Torgoth thanks to the efforst of the Excalibur.

event.incoming_comms_text: How is this possible? We were just fighting for our very lives against four Skaraan ships, and then in a split nanosecond we came face to face with you!

event.name: Comms 3

if_comms_button.text: We believe you traveled through that singularity. Our records indicate that you died fighting the Skaraan. We are not from this time either. In our timeline we are currently negotiating a ceasefire with the Torgoth thanks to the efforst of the Excalibur.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Emergency hail from TSN Command on COMMS.

clear_comms_button.text: We believe you traveled through that singularity. Our records indicate that you died fighting the Skaraan. We are not from this time either. In our timeline we are currently negotiating a ceasefire with the Torgoth thanks to the efforst of the Excalibur.

event.incoming_comms_text: This is Admiral Hansen broadcasting to all remaining USFP ships. I regret to inform you that we have failed to stop the Hegemony at Wolf 359, and suffered hundreds of casualties. While the battle persisted for weeks and we gave it our all, we have lost too much. Several Torgoth warships are headed to Earth as we speak, and it seems as though humankind as we know it is doomed. You are all to retreat to the Ximni system, and pray our former allies will show us mercy. Though they withdrew from the alliance, we have nowhere else to turn to. It is with no shred of dignity that I am able to ask this of you, but for whoever hears this message it has come time to run and hide. You are no good to us dead if we wish to fight another day. I only wish there was some way we could undo all of the war from the last quarter century... but I digress. Godspeed, my fellow Terrans, and may you thrive through it all.

event.name: Comms 4

set_comms_button.text: If you return to your time, you will be destroyed. Let us go with you and assist!
Understood, Captain. You realize you must return, and return alone?

event.incoming_comms_text: We just heard the message from TSN Command. I myself am Ximni. To think that our race abandoned the alliance... it's impossible. All this war, no, all this death... Could this all really have been avoided if we never traveled to this time? We shouldn't be here. The thought of us having run away from the battle, despite us facing inevitable destruction at the hands of the Skaraan, sickened my crew and I enough as it is. To think that we are somehow responsible for the way history has unfolded here as well... It's overwhelming.

event.name: Comms 5a

if_comms_button.text: Understood, Captain. You realize you must return, and return alone?

event.incoming_comms_text: Yes. We must prevent all this destruction. The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few. We are close to repairing our shields. We will need them so that we can last long enough to make a difference against the attackers. We are still prepared to and expect to die. But to die as one ship taking on several as you know is a Ximni dream come true. We won't let you down. Please buy us some time, and then we will approach the wormhole.

clear_comms_button.text: Understood, Captain. You realize you must return, and return alone?
If you return to your time, you will be destroyed. Let us go with you and assist!

event.name: Comms 5b

if_comms_button.text: If you return to your time, you will be destroyed. Let us go with you and assist!

clear_comms_button.text: If you return to your time, you will be destroyed. Let us go with you and assist!

event.incoming_comms_text: No! You cannot return with us! It appears as though our presence here has damaged history enough as it is. We must not damage the timeline further! Your records indicate that we do not survive this battle, but our lives could prevent the end of the Earth-Ximni alliance and save billions of lives then we need to take that chance. The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few. It will be a Ximni honor to perish as but one ship giving four of the strongest in the galaxy a run for their money. We are close to repairing our shields. We will need them so we can last long enough to make a difference against the Skaraan attackers. Buy us some time, and then we will approach the wormhole. We will not let you down.

clear_comms_button.text: Understood, Captain. You realize you must return, and return alone?

event.name: Comms 6
event.incoming_comms_text: We are all repaired, Captain. It's time we went home and fixed this mess. On your command we will return through the wormhole.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Enemy scout is on an intercept course.

event.name: Defeating the Scout III
event.incoming_comms_text: That ship was just a scout. Considering that we are deep in Torgoth space, more enemies will be here any second. Be careful, as these ships will not surrender here.

event.name: Three Goliaths II
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain, great work up there! We likely won't be able to hold off another advance, you better fix this mess soon because the Torgoth are definitely going to be brining up the big guns now that you've really pissed them off!

event.name: Unstoppable Wave
event.incoming_comms_text: This is it, bridge, it's now or never. If we don't fix this we won't reset the timeline and see the fruit of Envoy Ripley's labor!

event.name: Quick Rebuild
event.incoming_comms_text: I've got a lock on Ripley's signal again! She's signaling for us to come and pick her back up. Within 3500km of the station should be close enough.^

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Narendra III has reappeared. History has been repaired.

event.name: Envoy Beams Aboard
event.incoming_comms_text: I am back aboard. The mission was an outstanding success. The Torgoth upheld their word that they won't be helping us in fighting the remaining Hegemony forces, but they ARE declaring a galaxy-wide ceasefire on all USFP terrirotires, properties, and citizens! ...They even threw in an added bonus. We are going to be allowed safe passage through their territory from here on out, which means we will be able to explore areas of space that we have never seen before. This is a great day for the TSN and the USFP, and it's all thanks to you.^^History will never forget the name... Excalibur.

big_message.title: MISSION FAILED
big_message.subtitle1: You were unable to protect the other ship

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: The other Excalibur has been destroyed!

event.name: Failure - Narendra III Destroyed by Player
event.incoming_comms_text: This will surely be seen as an act of war from the Torgoth! You have ruined all of our hard work, Excalibur. Return to USFP space, where you will be awaiting a court marshall.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Narendra III has been destroyed!

event.name: Failure - Narendra III Destroyed by Player
event.incoming_comms_text: This will surely be seen as an act of war from the Torgoth! You have ruined all of our hard work, Excalibur. Return to USFP space, where you will be awaiting a court marshall.

warning_popup_message.message: COMPUTER: Narendra III has been destroyed!

big_message.title: MISSION SUCCESS!
big_message.subtitle2: Thank you for playing Season One!
